metadata.description:
Scripted from the work written by SadÄ±k Åžendil, one of the important names of Turkish humor, HÃ¼rmuz with Seven Husbands is a theatrical piece processed with the traditional Turkish theater technique. I was influenced by this character in my work and created "Pepelyn with Seven Husbands". In the work, you see Pepelyn and her 7 husbands who have succumbed to Pepelyn's lust. In order to draw attention to the NFT header, which plays an important role in the new Pepe existence in general, they have the ethereum symbol behind them and can be seen by the light emitted by the symbol. I chose to do very little shading on the characters, as there were no dramatized and emotional terms in the setting. To highlight the passion in Pepelyn's eyes, I used the brush I used to paint the background as if I were drawing a flame. Who knows, maybe Pepelyn has her eyes on an eight-year-old husband.

3000x4000
